item.name: Phrase Extraction
item.description: Key phrase extraction and categorization endpoints

body.raw:
{
  "imageUrl": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506905925346-21bda4d32df4",
  "descriptionText": "Una montaña majestuosa se alza contra el cielo azul brillante, con nieve blanca cubriendo su pico más alto. Los árboles verdes salpican las laderas inferiores, creando un contraste hermoso con la roca gris de la montaña.",
  "style": "conversacional",
  "targetLevel": "intermediate",
  "maxPhrases": 12,
  "categories": ["sustantivos", "adjetivos", "verbos"]
}

request.description: Extract key phrases with categorization and definitions

response.name: Successful Extraction

body.raw:
{
  "imageUrl": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-456",
  "descriptionText": "The bustling marketplace featured artisanal goods and seasonal produce, where entrepreneurs displayed remarkable business acumen while maintaining cultural authenticity.",
  "targetLevel": "advanced",
  "maxPhrases": 15,
  "categories": ["sustantivos", "adjetivos", "frasesClaves"]
}

request.description: Extract advanced-level phrases with complex vocabulary

body.raw:
{
  "userId": "{{USER_ID}}",
  "vocabulary": {
    "id": "vocab-mountain-123",
    "phrase": "montaña",
    "definition": "A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level",
    "category": "geography",
    "partOfSpeech": "noun",
    "difficulty": "beginner",
    "context": "La montaña es muy alta y majestuosa",
    "gender": "femenino",
    "article": "la",
    "examples": [
      "La montaña está cubierta de nieve",
      "Subimos la montaña en tres horas",
      "Desde la montaña se ve todo el valle"
    ],
    "tags": ["nature", "landscape", "geography"]
  },
  "collectionName": "nature-vocabulary",
  "metadata": {
    "source": "phrase-extraction",
    "confidence": 0.95,
    "timestamp": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"
  }
}

request.description: Save a single vocabulary item with metadata

body.raw:
{
  "userId": "{{USER_ID}}",
  "vocabularyItems": [
    {
      "phrase": "río",
      "definition": "A natural watercourse, usually freshwater, flowing towards an ocean, sea, lake or another river",
      "category": "geography",
      "difficulty": "beginner",
      "gender": "masculino",
      "article": "el",
      "examples": ["El río fluye hacia el mar"]
    },
    {
      "phrase": "bosque",
      "definition": "A large area covered chiefly with trees and undergrowth",
      "category": "geography",
      "difficulty": "beginner",
      "gender": "masculino",
      "article": "el",
      "examples": ["El bosque está lleno de vida"]
    },
    {
      "phrase": "valle",
      "definition": "A low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river or stream flowing through it",
      "category": "geography",
      "difficulty": "intermediate",
      "gender": "masculino",
      "article": "el",
      "examples": ["El valle es muy fértil"]
    }
  ],
  "collectionName": "geography-basics",
  "metadata": {
    "source": "bulk-import",
    "importDate": "2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"
  }
}
